remarks: Scalar product operation value (which is a functional) for the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualfvs.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
ldualfvs.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ldualfvs.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.s $e |- .xb = ( .s ` D ) $.
ldualfvs.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. Y ) $.
ldualvs.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
ldualvs.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvs $p |- ( ph -> ( X .xb G ) = ( G oF .X. ( V X. { X } ) ) ) $.
